articles.contents: Content is being generated as we speak… pls check back again…

articles.title: maRk's blog
articles.contents: Welcome! And thank you for stopping by. This blog was created using Distill for R Markdown and written entirely in R Studio. Hopefully, it will be a growing showcase of all projects related to R which I embark on.
